tldr: Affected versions of the `@rive-app/canvas` library are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow in the `DecodeJpeg` function of its C++ core. This vulnerability allows a remote attacker to perform an out-of-bounds memory write via a crafted JPEG or PNG file.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@rive-app/canvas` library to the patch version.
